name: opine-mcp-server
description: MCP server for querying Opine deals, evaluations, and tickets

scripts.inspector: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node build/index.js
scripts.docker:build:multiarch:
if [ -z "$DOCKERHUB_USERNAME" ]; then echo "DOCKERHUB_USERNAME env var is required" >&2; exit 1; fi; TAGS="${TAGS:-latest,${npm_package_version}}"; TAG_ARGS=$(printf "%s" "$TAGS" | tr ',' '
' | sed "s/^/ -t $DOCKERHUB_USERNAME\/opine-mcp-server:/" | tr '
' ' '); eval docker buildx build --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64 $TAG_ARGS --push .
